commit_message: Indented background noise filtering section in table of contents
Added sections of confidence levels, low allele SNV calling and background noise filtering.
Fixed typo in shebang
Handle situation in which there are too few variant loci to cluster sample/libraries and to create a VAF heatmap
Removed unnecessary prefixing of the data frame name in the filter operation checking for missing values
Added feature and feature type annotations from VEP to the variant table
Added new vepPickOneAnnotationPerVariant parameter to the configuration settings table

Added vepPickOneAnnotationPerVariant parameter to allow the user to choose whether only one VEP annotation should be included for each variant (allowing multiple annotations will result in a row for each VEP annotation)
Updated to use new vep_pick_option variable that either specifies the --pick option or is empty
Updated to handle multiple Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) annotations per variant if VEP is not run with the --pick option
Updated description for bamDir and outputDir parameters
Updated default setting for the VEP cache directory
Changed vep cache configuration setting in examples
Added example of specifying the log file
Removed apply_blacklist_filter process and R script now that the variants are annotated as whether they're blacklisted with a Blacklist column added to the output table.
FIxed error in the help description for the blacklist file argument

Major change to workflow in which tasks involving non-overlapping sets of amplicons no longer iterate over those amplicon groups but instead the pipeline creates separate processes for each library and amplicon group; associated changes to the way in which collated metrics, pileup counts and variant calls are annotated and sorted.
Updated description for samples argument, removed unnecessary checks on contents of sample sheet as already done in check_inputs process
Changed default VEP cache directory
Additional final output file for the collated amplicon coverage metrics (CSV file with selected columns)
Removed extraneous whitespace
Fixed path for reference genome FASTA file command line example
Added table of configuration settings
Updated description of amplicons and referenceGenomeFasta options
VEP annotation no longer carried out by deafult; default variant caller setting now capitalized.
Additional details about profiles and work directories.
Various updates and corrections
Added reference data top-level section heading, other minor changes/fixes
Update versions of dependencies to latest releases available in Conda
Rename sampleSheet and ampliconDetails parameters to samples and amplicons respectively
Added sections on Nextflow reports, log files and work directories.
Added section on execution profiles
Added sections on the reference genome sequence file, Ensembl VEP cache and running the pipeline with a container.
Added section on configuration file
Added section on configuration parameters and using command line arguments
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/crukci-bioinformatics/ampliconseq
Added note on configuring the sample sheet name/path and new section on the amplicon coordinates file
Changed default settings for the reference genome FASTA file and the amplicon coordinates file
Updated looping over amplicon groups after removing the Gene column that is no longer required.
Gene column in amplicon coordinates file no longer required
Gene column no longer required.
Added required column to sample sheet columns table
Various changes including new section on the sample sheet file.
Set bamDir parameter to null by default
Prepends the bam directory to the BAM file only if the bamDir parameter is set
Checks for BAM column and adds one if not present containing BAM file names where '.bam' is appended to the ID
Added updating section to table of contents
Added table of contents
Added section on installing ampliconseq
Added handling of replicate libraries to the list of features and reordered and updated the quickstart guide.
Added vepAnnotation command-line option to the help message and parameter summary
Added introduction and quickstart guide.
Minor punctuation change to class comment.
Revert to default singularity cache directory
Allow for PolyPhen column to not be present as VEP disables PolyPhen for some genome assemblies.
Added vepAnnotation parameter and workflow logic so that VEP annotation is now optional
VEP annotation file is now an optional input
Show all columns of VAF correlation table for mismatched replicates following update to assess_replicate_vaf.R
Correct mime type for heatmap images - png instead of svg to reduce size of report when large number of libraries.
Restore mistakenly deleted code

Changed minimum proportions of variants and libraries having AF values, reduce number of variants if large by sampling and removing highly correlated variants, reworked logic for identifying possible replicate mismatches.
Read in numbers of bases from Picard CollectTargetPcrMetrics as doubles rather than integers as can exceed maximum value for a 32-bit integer in R
Updated for creation of PNG files for heatmap plots
Use svglite for create plot SVG files, add creation of PNGs using rsvg package
Use variable for plot widths
Replaced by separate R scripts for creating coverage plots and generating the Nozzle report
Updated R to 4.1, fitdistrplus to 1.1_5, ComplexHeatmap to 2.8.0 and Ensembl VEP to 104.3, added rsvg dependency
Remove MD5 sum file creation, don't think this is needed by the minoconda install script in its MD5 self-check
Changed text indicating no mismatch replicate libraries detected.

Add processes for collating alignment and coverage metrics, creating yield and coverage plots, assessing replicates based on clustering and correlation of SNV allele fractions and creating the QC report.
Fix file name for mismatched replicates correlation table output file
New R script for creating a QC report from the collated alignment and coverage metrics and plots and the library replicate clustering.
Added column labels to the correlation heatmap and adjusted size accordingly.
Minor change to variable names/column headings for the percentages of bases on/near/off-amplicon
Compute percentages for some metrics, on/near/off amplicon percentages now percentages of all bases
New R script for creating yield and amplicon coverage plots
Change output directory argument to output prefix with a default value so not mandatory
New R script for assessing how well sample replicates are correlated based on SNV allele fractions.
Added code for summing the number of bases within target regions for assigned reads, all commented out as using pileup counts instead for now (could change in future)
Compute derived metrics (mostly percentages) and now writes output to CSV file
New R script for collating alignment and coverage metrics from Picard CollectAlignmentSummaryMetrics, Picard CollectTargetedPcrMetrics, the ExtractAmpliconRegions utility and the pileup counts.
Fixed hard-coded targeted PCR metrics file name

Reads that fail the vendor filter are no longer extracted, mapping quality and duplicate flag no longer affect the mean coverage calculation, fixed number of reads (read ends for paired end sequencing) assigned and changed order of columns in output coverage metrics table.
Minor typo in comment
Increase time limits for several processes following testing on very large dataset
Change pileup column types so that the default is character and explicitly specify the integer columns that are used in AF calculations
Updated R to version 4.0.5, tidyverse to 1.3.1, Ensembl VEP to release 104.2

Add sample id to the bam tuple for processes that have been updated to use this, sort various metrics and pileup counts files when collating with collectFile and store the output in the results directory or qc subdirectory
Removed outputPrefix parameter
Use new R script to collate and sort pileup counts
New script for collating and sorting pileup counts.
Collate and sort coverage metrics using new R script
New R script for collating and sorting amplicon coverage files.
Add sample identifier argument to extract_picard_metrics.R, fix hard-coded amplicon groups file name
Add sample identifier in additional column
Add maximumReadsPerAlignmentStart parameter to downsample reads when running GATK HaplotypeCaller (default value of 2500 equates to a downsampled depth of around 5000).
Make filter value for a variant that was not called within a library much more visible by changing it to all upper case NOT_CALLED, much like PASS for those variants that pass all filters.
Add if/elif branch to call VarDict or GATK HaplotypeCaller depending on configuration setting, use new tidy_variant_table.R script to modify table of variants called.

New R script for modifying the output from GATK VariantsToTable including adding a library ID column, separating ref and alt allele depths in their own columns, rounding quality scores and computing the allele fraction if no value was extracted

Add blacklist column to final variant table instead of adding as a filter since it doesn't apply to each replicate library separately and the user may want to see those variants if called and not otherwise filtered.
Add option to specify variant caller, rename vardict.sh template to call_variants.sh
Updated handling of column types when reading pileup counts file/chunks
Remove N count column from output table
Added configuration setting for minimum depth of high-confidence calls
Updated for additional reference sequence index argument for summarize_variants process
Added confidence level calculated from the replicates in which the calls pass filters; added reference sequence index command-line argument to use for chromosome order when sorting variants
Offset for contigs in reference sequence index can exceed maximum value for an integer in R so read in as numeric (effectively double) instead
Read allele fraction and noise thresholds as doubles instead of parsing afterwards
Read Position column in as integer instead of parsing later, round user/elapsed time expended
Change type of numeric columns in the reference sequence index to integer
Increase time limit for computing background noise thresholds
Annotation processes now follow on from add_specific_variants
Increased JVM overhead for Java processes
compute_background_noise_thresholds now has additional variants input, no longer publish noise thresholds
No longer need to rename Ref and Alt columns following changes to compute_background_noise_thresholds.R
Added option to restrict position-based noise modelling to positions for a given set of variants
Use mutate and across instead of deprecated mutate_at
Use pivot_wider in place of deprecated spread
SVG files now written to working directory and not deleted
Add limitSize=FALSE to allow for really large plots when there are very large numbers of samples or amplicons
New process for summarizing variants
New R script for summarizing variants and adding annotations
Rename column headings and add alleles column
Fix comparison of allele fractions when applying noise filters
Add R script and process for filtering blacklisted variants
Turn off position in reads filter as recommended for targeted PCR sequencing
Sort distinct variants for annotation into coordinate order(required by VEP)
Sort outputs based on chromosome order in reference sequence index
Remove extraneous white space
Changed entry in the Filters field for missed calls
Defaulting to character type on reading in variants and pileup counts, explicitly parse counts and depths to integers prior to computing the allele fraction.
Updated for change of naming from dataset to library, added new apply_background_noise_filters process
New R script to add background noise thresholds to the variants table and apply background noise filters.
Replaced dataset with library in argument and variable names for clarity (assume each input BAM file is from a separate library)
Fixed description for pileup-counts argument
Added R script and process definition for adding depth and allele fraction computed from pileup counts
Fixed description of output file
Reorder extracted fields
Reordered processes to reflect order they are run in
Added add_specific_variants process
New R script for adding specific variants to the called variants producing an expanded variant table
No longer need to work on multiple input files
check_inputs process now depends on the amplicon groups output from create_non_overlapping_amplicon_groups
Added amplicons argument to check_specific_variants.R
Simplify filtering for missing values, lambda not needed
Simplify filter for missing values, lambda not needed
Now checks that the specific variants are within amplicon targets and annotates the dataset IDs and amplicons, writes the checked/annotated variants as tab-delimited
Updated to read tab-delimited sample sheet file
Checked blacklist file now written as tab-delimited
Checked sample sheet file now written as tab-delimited
Added checks for unmatched samples and multi-allelic variants in specific variants file
Added check for multi-allelic variants (not allowed)
Updated for change to input option name for create_distinct_vcf.R script
Renamed check_samples process to check_inputs and added checks for validity of the specific variants and blacklisted variants files.
Template script for check_inputs process
Removing quoting for the output file(not necessary)
Now handles multiple input variant files
Change option name and variable for input file for consistency with other similar scripts
Added config parameters for the specific variants and blacklist files
Renamed check_samples_file.R to check_sample_sheet.R, renamed check_samples process to check_inputs as it will also be used to check the specific variants and blacklist files
Added R script for checking blacklisted variants file
Added R script for checking specific variants file
Added empty resource files for specific/known variants and blacklisted variants
Added variant annotation process
Added configurable parameter for sequence context length annotation.
Template script for new variant annotation process
Added wrapper script generation for new AddAssortedAnnotationsToVcf utility
New command-line utility for adding sequence context and indel length annotations to a VCF file
Add VCF header line to output file
Removed erroneous additions
Fix command line for AnnotateVcfWithAmpliconIds utility
Change comment to reflect that the create_distinct_vcf.R script is more general than just creating input for VEP
Renamed create_vep_input.R to create_distinct_vcf.R
Create variables for output files within processes and use these in the template scripts
Added new process for Ensembl VEP annotation
Template script for new Ensembl VEP process
New R script for extracting Ensembl VEP annotations from the output VCF file into a tabular format
New R script for creating a VCF file containing distinct variants for annotation with Ensembl VEP
Added allele fraction column to output table
Updates to allow for IDs and BAM file names to contain spaces (not that that's a good idea)
Added various configuration parameters
Removed '=' for arguments to extract_picard_metrics.R script for consistency
Added default parameter for JVM memory overhead, used when setting the maximum heap size for Java tasks.
Added setting for maximum Java heap size.
Added function for obtaining the maximum Java heap size to allocate for a Java task.
Updated alignment_coverage_report.R to use optparse for handling command line arguments
Show help if no arguments specified (note this script is not part of the pipeline but is a utility script so ok to do so)
Updated to use optparse for handling command-line arguments
Renamed R script
Updated extract_picard_metrics.R to use optparse for handling command line arguments
Removed extraneous whitespace
Use echo -e and \t for tab characters when writing new column headings to variant output table
Updated create_non_overlapping_amplicon_groups.R to use optparse for command line arguments
Updated check_samples_file.R script to use optparse
Added checks for required arguments, no longer show help if no options provided so that the pipeline can fail gracefully.
Added checks for command line arguments
Added copyright notice
Added process for computing background noise thresholds, rearranged tasks in workflow
Added R script for computing background substitution noise thresholds
Renamed --intervals flag to --amplicon-intervals, similarly renamed amplicon intervals variables for clarity and renamed column header for pileup counts from Interval to Amplicon.
Added process for generating the alignment coverage report.
Use of file.rename doesn't work for moving the temporary report file from within a container to a mounted output directory so using file.copy instead.
Added fonts
Changed reading of samples file to be csv instead of tsv
Added svglite R package
Added R Nozzle report generation script
Use named samples channel produced by check_sample process.
Refactored to use new Pileup class that has replaced PileupUtils in the htsjdk-tools package.
Updated for change of method name (PileupUtils.filterOverlaps), added comment on differences between this tool and the same named one in htsjdk-tools
Added configuration option for validation stringency to apply to BAM file
Added configuration option for validation stringency of BAM file

Removed try/finally clause used for closing readers/iterators since these can actually throw exceptions and mask the causitive error, also call close() method instead of using CloserUtil and fail if such a call throws an exception
Command line programs now implement the Callable interface
Minor changes to formatting/spacing
Remove types for generics and allow Java to infer where possible to simplify code, remove unnecessary use of CloserUtil
Removed unnecessary use of CloserUtil
Added 'set -e -o pipefail' so that the template script fails on the first error
Added 'set -e -o pipefail' so that the template script fails on first error, added maximum heap size setting for pileup-counts Java program
Migrate command line interface from Apache Commons CLI to picocli
Removed extra JVM arguments, instead these should be set using the JAVA_OPTS environment variable appropriately for each program/tool
Changed version number to 1.0-snapshot
Set default values for minimum base and mapping qualities, added check for whether each has been set before attempting to parse the value
Added log message to indicate successful completion
Fixed long option name for minimum mapping quality
Fixed issues parsing command line arguments
Fix issue with not extracting minimum base and mapping quality values from command line arguments.
Added build of htsjdk-tools dependency
Remove utility classes that were moved into the htsjdk-tools repository and add htsjdk-tools a dependency, update references in command-line tools accordingly.
Enable singularity by default for the cluster profile only
Fixed option names in help message (camel case, not hyphenated)
Specify Conda version and ampliconseq branch/tag, use of apt-get to avoid warning messages, replace deprecated MAINTAINER with LABEL
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/crukci-bioinformatics/ampliconseq
Moved default parameter settings into nextflow.config and prefaced these with 'vep'
Moved default parameter settings into nextflow.config
Added Makefile for building and pushing docker image to Docker Hub
Replace tab with spaces
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/crukci-bioinformatics/ampliconseq
Replaced license at start of Java source files with copyright and license notice
Removed trailing whitespace
Singularity now used by default without need for -with-singularity argument
Added single process workflow for downloading the VEP cache
Move R and R package installation to conda environment, install conda packages in ampliconseq environment instead of the base environment and set path accordingly
Added Ensembl VEP, R and R package dependencies to conda environment
Fix issue with vscode editor substituting tab characters for spaces
Added tabular variants output for the call_variants process
Added extraction of variants to a tab-delimited file using GATK VariantsToTable
Use of template scripts and combine operations run on separate amplicon groups into single template script/process to avoid having too many very small jobs
Minor changes for consistent use of whitespace (no tab characters)
Template script for calling variants with VarDict
Template script for generating pileup counts.
Fix issue with not using ! for nextflow variable substitution
collate coverage output files
Fixed issue with formatting of output
Template script for running Picard CollectAlignmentSummaryMetrics and CollectTargetedPcrMetrics
Template for extracting subset BAM files for each amplicon group
Output file now an additional parameter, no longer outputs separate amplicon files for each group
id option now required and renamed amplicon column in output
Reworked to process each interval separately so that the interval name can be included in the output table.
Fixed typo in class-level comments
Added call_variants and merge_sample_vcfs processes, updating input and output option flags following updates to command-line tools.
Fix extraction of input and output files from command line options
Use of input and output options for main input and output files for consistency across command line tools
New command-line program to annotate variants in a VCF file with the id of the amplicon in which these were called
Add missing bracket in description for id option
Removed Rscript from usage help
Remove junit dependency for now, giving vulnerability warnings in GitHub
Renamed symbolic link to built and unpacked tools package
Removed R scripts from tools assembly as these should now be available to the workflow from the repository cloned by Nedxtflow
Increase memory for Picard metrics processes
Moved R scripts from R directory to the bin directory which is available on the path.
Added Picard metrics tasks, moved resource specification to process definitions, now expects R scripts to be executable and on the path.
Moved resource directives to process definitions in main workflow file
Usage message no longer prefaced by 'Error:'
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/crukci-bioinformatics/ampliconseq
Reorganized deployment layout for ampliconseq
Removed extra newline when printing version information
Removed executable permissions, setting these in the assembly instead.
Added implementation entries to packaged jar file and option to print version information using -v flag
Added R scripts to assembly
Changed to be executable
Added Rscript shebang
New R script for extracting Picard metrics table and adding an ID column

Added Dockerfile and conda configuration file for the docker container based on the Maven container and with R/tidyverse and the ampliconseq Java utilities installed as well as GATK, VarDictJava and FreeBayes installed using conda
Add pileup counts process, collect all amplicon coverage summaries into single file
Rename reference sequence index file variable for consistency with workflow
Added optional id parameter which will include this, if set, as an additional ID column in the tabular summary
Simplify tuple creation in amplicon groups channel
Added amplicon ID to BED file created for the extract-amplicon-regions tool
Add resource configuration for create_non_overlapping_amplicon_groups and extract_amplicon_regions processes
Correct output from extract_amplicon_regions for coverage when collecting coverage metrics for each bam
Added channels for BAM files and amplicon groups, process for extracting amplicon regions and collecting the amplicon coverage metrics
Renamed R script for creating non-overlapping groups of amplicons
Output tsv file for each amplicon group containing both amplicon and target coordinates instead of separate target and amplicon bed files
Script for creating the new amplicon details file from the amplicon and target intervals files and gene details files used in previous version of the pipeline.
Reworked so that amplicon details are in a single file containing information on both amplicon and target coords
Added .factorypath and test directory to ignore list
New command line program and helper class for tabulating read counts for each base and locus within a given set of intervals.
Added progress logger, some reformatting
Updated comments and minor reformatting
Minor reformatting
Added method for getting the help description.
Separate out code for setting amplicon read flags and determining whether to include a read into methods
Updated to use new base class for command line programs
New abstract base class for command line programs
Added check for null coverage writer before closing, minor refactoring.
Added separate static method for reading a Picard-style interval list
Added license header
Logging configuration
Assembly descriptor for tarball containing utility programs
Maven project with configuration for assembly and appassembler plugins.
Utility for extracting aligned sequence read pairs from a BAM file that match to a given set of amplicon coordinates.
Utility class with static helper methods for reading BED and interval list files using htsjdk functions
Write 6-column BED files for groups of non-overlapping amplicons
Added vscode directory to git ignore list
Initial commit for migration of the ampliconseq pipeline to Nextflow including R tasks/scripts for checking the input samples file and creating non-overlapping sets of amplicons
Added maven settings and target dir to git ignore list
Initial commit
